text: The 2001 UBS Open was a men's tennis tournament played on outdoor clay courts at the Roy Emerson Arena in Gstaad in Switzerland and was part of the International Series of the 2001 ATP Tour. It was the 56th edition of the tournament and ran from 9 July until 15 July 2001. Jiří Novák won the singles title. ==Finals== ===Singles=== Jiří Novák defeated Juan Carlos Ferrero 6–1, 6–7(5–7), 7–5 * It was Novák's 3rd title of the year and the 18th of his career. ===Doubles=== Roger Federer / Marat Safin defeated Michael Hill / Jeff Tarango 0–1 (Hill and Tarango retired) * It was Federer's 3rd title of the year and the 3rd of his career. It was Safin's 1st title of the year and the 9th of his career. ==External links== * Official Website * Official Website * Official Website * ATP Tournament Profile UBS Open Category:Swiss Open (tennis) Category:2001 in Swiss sport
title: 2001 UBS Open
